text:
If you open a document that has entities like & or > in it (for example
entered with the Form Editor) these are tranformed into &amp; and &gt;.
This happens already when you open the one form editor not just when you save,
i.e. the content of the form is alreaddy re-escaped, which shouldn't be.
fixed the double re-escaping in the usecase sitemap
